item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. IMG_0001 (65 points | 6 comments)
2. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (393 points | 228 comments)
3. Egoless Engineering (412 points | 141 comments)
4. EmacsConf 2024 (29 points | discuss)
5. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (360 points | 534 comments)
6. A Particle Physics Course for High-School Students (16 points | discuss)
7. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (109 points | 15 comments)
8. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir with Membran (13 points | discuss)
9. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (213 points | 64 comments)
10. The Tube Computer (147 points | 46 comments)
11. Gratitude despite the odds (11 points | 1 comment)
12. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (69 points | 14 comments)
13. Show HN: My C compiler compiled itself (101 points | 27 comments)
14. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (47 points | 13 comments)
15. Phoenix LiveView 1.0.0 is here (329 points | 60 comments)
16. Formaldehyde Causes More Cancer Than Any Other Toxic Air Pollutant (39 points | 21 comments)

20. A new home for Python-build-standalone (38 points | 11 comments)
21. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (123 points | 150 comments)
22. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (42 points | 9 comments)
23. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
24. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (132 points | 116 comments)
25. Show HN: Book and change flights with one email (62 points | 24 comments)
26. Homography Explained with Code (16 points | 2 comments)
27. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (60 points | 23 comments)
28. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D engine (179 points | 41 comments)
29. My brand new digitizing workflow using a 25 year old film scanner (89 points | 43 comments)
30. Amazon Nova (302 points | 117 comments)
